index.html:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <title>Syncfusion React Sample</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0, user-scalable=no" />
    <meta http-equiv="x-ua-compatible" content="ie=edge">
    <meta name="description" content="Syncfusion React UI Components" />
    <meta name="author" content="Syncfusion" />
    <link href="////npmci.syncfusion.com/packages/development/{{theme}}.css" rel="stylesheet">
    <link href="https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/3.3.7/css/bootstrap.min.css" rel="stylesheet" />
</head>

<body class="{{theme}}">
    <div id='sample'>
</body>
</html>
index.js:
import { render } from 'react-dom';
import './index.css';
import * as React from 'react';
import { PivotViewComponent } from '@syncfusion/ej2-react-pivotview';
import { SampleBase } from './sample-base';
/**
 * PivotView Default Sample.
 */
const SAMPLE_CSS = `
.e-pivotview {
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
}`;
let dataSourceSettings = {
    enableSorting: true,
    columns: [{ name: 'Year' }, { name: 'Quarter' }],
    valueSortSettings: { headerDelimiter: ' - ' },
    values: [{ name: 'Sold', caption: 'Units Sold' }, { name: 'Amount', caption: 'Sold Amount' }],
    dataSource: getPivotData(),
    rows: [{ name: 'Country' }, { name: 'Products' }],
    formatSettings: [{ name: 'Amount', format: 'C0' }],
    expandAll: false,
    filters: []
};
function getPivotData() {
    let pivotData = [
        { 'Sold': 31, 'Amount': 52824, 'Country': 'France', 'Products': 'Mountain Bikes', 'Year': 'FY 2015', 'Quarter': 'Q1' },

}
export class Default extends SampleBase {
    render() {
        return (<div className='control-pane'>
                <style>
                    {SAMPLE_CSS}
                </style>
                <div className='control-section' style={{ overflow: 'auto' }}>
                    <PivotViewComponent id='PivotView' dataSourceSettings={dataSourceSettings} width={'100%'} height={'300'} gridSettings={{ columnWidth: 140 }}>
                    </PivotViewComponent>
                </div>
            </div>);
    }
}

render(<Default />, document.getElementById('sample'));
